name: Justice Bear: Playground
description:
Playground is a collection of some of our prototypes and demakes that we would like to share with you, playable in a virtual handheld console. You can switch anytime between Color mode or Pocket mode (a classic 8bit four-shades-of-green filter). Each game has one achievement and, when possible, a leaderboard.

We'll keep updating Playground with more games. Currently it includes:

• Equinox Down: Infinite runner
• Wisp Hunter: Pang clone
